title: Linkedin reconnect message Writer
original_prompt: Craft a LinkedIn message to reconnect with a former colleague or classmate, {name: Lili}, the details are {details: we both graduated from University of Miami, class of 2020, and now I want to connect with her to see if there are internship opportunities. }
input1: Hi Lili, I hope this message finds you well! It's been a while since we graduated from the University of Miami in 2020. I wanted to reach out and reconnect, as I'm currently exploring internship opportunities and thought you might have some insights or leads. Would love to catch up and hear what you've been up to!
input2: Hey Lili! I can't believe it's been so long since our days at the University of Miami, class of 2020. I’m reaching out because I’m on the lookout for internship opportunities and thought you might have some valuable advice or connections. Let’s reconnect and chat about our experiences since graduation!
input1_ans:
Subject: Reconnecting and Exploring Opportunities

Hi Lili,

I hope this message finds you well! It’s hard to believe it’s been a while since we graduated from the University of Miami in 2020. I’ve been thinking about our time there and wanted to reach out to reconnect.

I’m currently exploring internship opportunities and thought you might have some insights or leads in your network. I’d love to catch up and hear what you’ve been up to since graduation!

Looking forward to hearing from you!

Best,  
[Your Name]  
[Your LinkedIn Profile URL]

Hi Lili,

I hope this message finds you well! It's been a while since we graduated from the University of Miami in 2020. I wanted to reach out and reconnect, as I'm currently exploring internship opportunities and thought you might have some insights or leads. 

I would love to catch up and hear what you've been up to! Let me know if you’re available for a chat sometime soon.

Best,  
[Your Name]
input2_ans:
Subject: Reconnecting and Seeking Your Insight

Hi Lili!

I hope this message finds you well! It’s hard to believe it’s been so long since our days at the University of Miami, class of 2020. I’ve been reflecting on our time there and the great memories we shared.

I’m currently exploring internship opportunities and thought you might have some valuable insights or connections in the field. I’d love to catch up and hear about your experiences since graduation. 

Let me know if you’d be open to a chat sometime soon!

Best,  
[Your Name]  
[Your LinkedIn Profile Link]

That sounds like a great message! It’s friendly and to the point, while also expressing your desire to reconnect. If you’d like, I can help you refine it further or suggest ways to follow up after sending it. Just let me know!
